```{r}
library(fs)
library(parallel)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(patchwork)
library(here)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
setwd(here())

path <- "./wrapper_MM/plots_500/"
files <- list.files(path, pattern = "\\.RData$", full.names = TRUE)
lapply(files, load, .GlobalEnv)
plots_500 <- plots
remove(plots)
```
